main event: A young student spotted a large fluorescent object in the sky that hovered and then suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The object appeared to have two separated but very close windows.
The object was stationary and slowly moving at times, and had a dull side.
There was no noise coming from the object.
The student's mother and other people also witnessed the object a few weeks earlier.
The object suddenly went dark and disappeared completely.
sighted object: a large fluorescent object in the sky
witnesses: a young student, the student's mother, and other people
